loading.timeout: Is Adapt not launching? The servers at Adapt might be down. Come back a later time!
loading.check_status: You can also try checking out our {{link}}.

banner.description: This will be shown at the top of the channel sidebar and on the server home page.

roles.description: Roles are used to group members in your server and grant them permissions.

view_channel.label: View Channels
view_channel.description: Members with this permission can view channels and receive events from them.

modify_channels.label: Modify Channels
modify_channels.description: Members with this permission can manage settings of channels, including changing the name, topic, icon, slowmode, NSFW status, and locking/unlocking.

manage_channels.label: Manage Channels
manage_channels.description: Members with this permission can manage channels, including creating, deleting, changing positions, moving between categories, and editing permission overwrites.

view_message_history.label: View Message History
view_message_history.description: Members with this permission can view the message history of text channels, even if they cannot send or receive new messages.

send_messages.label: Send Messages
send_messages.description: Members with this permission can send messages in text-based channels. The View Channels permission is required.

manage_messages.label: Manage Messages
manage_messages.description: Members with this permission can manage messages sent by others, including deleting, removing reactions, and unpublishing in announcement channels.

attach_files.label: Attach Files
attach_files.description: Members with this permission can attach files to messages in text-based channels.

send_embeds.label: Send Embeds
send_embeds.description: Members with this permission can send rich embeds or have embed links automatically appear in text-based channels.

use_external_emojis.label: Use External Emojis
use_external_emojis.description: Members with this permission can use emojis from other servers.

add_reactions.label: Add Reactions
add_reactions.description: Members with this permission can add new reactions to messages in text-based channels.

pin_messages.label: Pin Messages
pin_messages.description: Members with this permission can pin and unpin messages in text-based channels.

star_messages.label: Star Messages
star_messages.description: Members with this permission can star and unstar messages in text-based channels.

publish_messages.label: Publish Messages
publish_messages.description: Members with this permission can publish messages to the announcement channel feed.

bulk_delete_messages.label: Bulk Delete Messages
bulk_delete_messages.description: Members with this permission can delete or purge messages in bulk in text-based channels.

privileged_mentions.label: Privileged Mentions
privileged_mentions.description: Members with this permission can mention large groups of people, including everyone or non-mentionable roles, in text-based channels.

manage_webhooks.label: Manage Webhooks
manage_webhooks.description: Members with this permission can create, edit, and delete webhooks in text-based channels.

connect.label: Connect
connect.description: Members with this permission can connect to voice channels.

speak.label: Speak
speak.description: Members with this permission can speak in voice channels.

mute_members.label: Mute Members
mute_members.description: Members with this permission can mute other members in voice channels.

deafen_members.label: Deafen Members
deafen_members.description: Members with this permission can deafen other members in voice channels.

change_nickname.label: Change Nickname
change_nickname.description: Members with this permission can change their own nickname on the server.

manage_nicknames.label: Manage Nicknames
manage_nicknames.description: Members with this permission can change the nicknames of other members on the server.

manage_emojis.label: Manage Emojis
manage_emojis.description: Members with this permission can create, edit, and delete emojis for the server.

manage_starboard.label: Manage Starboard
manage_starboard.description: Members with this permission can delete starboard posts or disable the starboard for the server.

manage_guild.label: Manage Server
manage_guild.description: Members with this permission can manage the server's settings, including changing the name, icon, visibility, and enabling/disabling the starboard.

manage_roles.label: Manage Roles
manage_roles.description: Members with this permission can manage the server's roles, edit permissions of lower roles, and assign/remove roles from other members.

create_invites.label: Create Invites
create_invites.description: Members with this permission can create invites to the server.

manage_invites.label: Manage Invites
manage_invites.description: Members with this permission can revoke or pause invites of any channel in the server.

timeout_members.label: Timeout Members
timeout_members.description: Members with this permission can timeout and untimeout members with a lower role than them.

kick_members.label: Kick Members
kick_members.description: Members with this permission can kick members with a lower role than them from the server.

ban_members.label: Ban Members
ban_members.description: Members with this permission can ban and unban members with a lower role than them from the server.

view_audit_log.label: View Audit Log
view_audit_log.description: Members with this permission can view an audit log of past moderation or other privileged actions on the server.

administrator.label: Administrator
administrator.description: Members with this permission have the ability to override all permissions and any channel on the server.

edit_profile.label: Customize your profile
edit_profile.description: Let others on Adapt know who you are. Give yourself a display name, change your avatar, and write a bio.

add_friend.label: Connect with friends
add_friend.description: Find your friends on Adapt, add them to your friends list, and start chatting with them.

join_guild.label: Join a community
join_guild.description: Create, discover, join, and chat in communities that suit your interests. You may also join the official {{server_link}}.

error.open_issue: If this error persists, please {{link}} in the GitHub repository.
